metadata.synopsis: Angry demonstator. Part of a mob of irate tieflings who have gathered to protest the druids' actions. They fear the druids will place them in danger in order to protect the grove. Later, the druids might stand down and the tiefling might remark upon this in a calmer tone.

0.speaker: Rechel
0.text: Lives are at stake, and the cowards only care about their bloody rituals!
0.context: NodeContext: Spoken to the player re; the druids, who are still relatively close.

1.speaker: Rechel
1.text: Those druids are going to get us killed - nothing sacred about this lot!
1.context: NodeContext: Spoken to the player re; the druids, who are still relatively close.

2.speaker: Rechel
2.text: Now they're done messing about with rituals, maybe them lot can make themselves useful.
2.context: NodeContext: Calmer than before - druids have stood down
